text: Ali Benflis (; born 8 September 1944) is an Algerian politician who was Head of Government of Algeria from 2000 to 2004. In 2003, he became the general secretary of the National Liberation Front party. He ran for President of Algeria twice in 2004 and in 2014. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Algeria
title: Ali Benflis
